content: Phase 3.1: Implement Marker Pagination (16 hours) - Design and implement lazy loading for 10,000+ markers
Phase 3.2: Complete Shortcut Conflict Detection (8 hours) - Add comprehensive conflict detection for all shortcuts
Phase 4.1: Optimize Performance Monitoring (8 hours) - Implement debounced updates and adaptive sampling
Phase 4.2: Memory Optimization (8 hours) - Implement LRU cache and memory pressure handling
Phase 4.3: Error Handling Improvements (8 hours) - Convert validation to throw errors with recovery suggestions
